teaser: As our regular listeners know, New York is where Marketplace Tech lives. And while the evidence that NYC is a legitimate challenger to Silicon Valley isn't hard to find, any conversation about a home grown technology industry must still include that comparison. And senior editor of Quartz Zach Seward joins us to play Silicon Tally.

title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, December 27, 2013
